vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βαρτίμαιος, -ου, ὁ (-μαῖος, T; perh. Aram. בַּר־טִמְאַי, see DB, iv, p. 762),
Bartimæus: Mrk.10:46.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Bartimaeus, "son of Timai" or "son of uncleanness"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mrk.10.46;
son of: Timaeus (G5090)
§ Bartimaeus, "son of Timai" or "son of uncleanness"
Bartimaeus, (Proper name), Mk. 10:46*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴底買 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在亞蘭文的意思是 "底買的兒子"
一個瞎子 (可 10:46)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴底买 这个阳性专有名词 人名在亚兰文的意思是 "底买的儿子"
一个瞎子 (可 10:46)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ba-ti-mê «con của Timaeus ». Xem H1247 (con) và H2931.
